full_summary:
### 01634-221004 Segmented Flow Analyzer Solicitation
#### REFERENCE NUMBER: WS3752989625
#### AMENDMENT NUMBER: 2

 On February 16, 2023, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) published a request for proposals (RFP) for the supply, delivery, and installation of one (1) new segmented flow analyzer for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada in Morden, Manitoba.

The solicitation is managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC). The segmented flow analyzer is expected to be delivered and installed by June 1, 2023.

#### SCOPE OF WORK
The successful bidder will be required to provide a new segmented flow analyzer, which is a laboratory and scientific equipment as per the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) 41100000. 

#### TENDER NOTICE INFORMATION
* Solicitation Number: WS3752989625
* Publication Date: February 16, 2023
* Tender Closing Date:March 24, 2023, at 14:00 EDT (Eastern Daylight Time)
* Amendment Date: March 14, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: February 5, 2024

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders who submitted proposals in the previous solicitation, which was cancelled and superseded by this RFP.

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the lowest price. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements will be observed.
